bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: DL4J: Known issues and test failures
bug.description:
This issue: a summary/burn-down list for DL4J for the next release. Failing tests:
deeplearning4j-core: native OK; CUDA: https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/issues/5955 deeplearning4j-cuda: testDataTypes failing (https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/issues/5996); known (non-critical) issue with LRN https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/issues/5088 nearestneighbor-core: 1 failure - RPUtils.testDistanceComputeBatch deeplearning4j-nlp: a bunch of failures (not new) deeplearning4j-spark-ml: 1 failure
Minor issues, being worked on: https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/issues/5981 https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/issues/5982 https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/issues/5983 https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/issues/5974 Other to-dos, if time allows:
Reduce PW tests runtime Another pass on DL4J integration tests

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
